sk1.name: Mana Break
sk1.desc: Burns an opponent's mana on each attack. Mana Break deals 60%% of the mana burned as damage to the target.Mana Break is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

sk2.name: Blink
sk2.desc: Short distance teleportation that allows Anti-Mage to move in and out of combat.

sk3.name: Spell Shield
sk3.desc: Increases Anti-Mage's resistance to magic damage.

sk4.name: Mana Void
sk4.desc: For each point of mana missing by the target unit, damage is dealt to it and surrounding enemies. The main target is also mini-stunned.
